title: Apple II
description: The Apple II is a 16-bit personal computer developed by Apple. It was the first personal computer to run on a 16-bit bus, and it was the first personal computer to run on a 16-bit bus.

title: Commodore 64
description: The Commodore 64 is a 64-bit personal computer developed by Commodore. It was the first personal computer to run on a 64-bit bus, and it was the first personal computer to run on a 64-bit bus.

title: IBM PC
